description(context=NoticeType, param=ty.all: Check all notices in chronological order
description(context=NoticeType, param=ty.deadline: Articles that are about to expire within a week
description(context=NoticeType, param=ty.hot: Articles that have been viewed more than 150 times in the last week

author: Author
reminderDescription:
If you set a reminder,
I'll let you know n days before the deadline!

reminderLogin.title: You can set reminders if you log in
reminderLogin.description: Log in and get a deadline reminder n days in advance!

report.title: Do you want to report this notice?
report.description: Once reported, the administrator will review this notice and take action.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this notice?
delete.description: Once deleted, it cannot be restored.
